title: Retrieve self assessment tax calculation messages
description: Retrieve self assessment tax calculation messages

summary.title: summary
summary.description: Details of allowances, deductions and reliefs used in the calculation.

totalAllowancesAndDeductions.title: totalAllowancesAndDeductions
totalAllowancesAndDeductions.description: The total allowances and deductions used in the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

totalReliefs.title: totalReliefs
totalReliefs.description: The total reliefs used in the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

detail.title: details
detail.description: Details the breakdown of allowances, deductions and reliefs used in the calculation.

allowancesAndDeductions.title: allowancesAndDeductions
allowancesAndDeductions.description: Details allowances and deductions used in the calculation.

personalAllowance.title: personalAllowance
personalAllowance.description: The personal allowance available for the tax year. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

reducedPersonalAllowance.title: reducedPersonalAllowance
reducedPersonalAllowance.description: The amount that the personal allowance has been reduced to. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

giftOfInvestmentsAndPropertyToCharity.title: giftOfInvestmentsAndPropertyToCharity
giftOfInvestmentsAndPropertyToCharity.description: Investments and/or property gifts made to charity. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

blindPersonsAllowance.title: blindPersonsAllowance
blindPersonsAllowance.description: Blind persons allowance. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

lossesAppliedToGeneralIncome.title: lossesAppliedToGeneralIncome
lossesAppliedToGeneralIncome.description: Losses that have been applied to general income. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999. No decimals.

reliefs.title: reliefs
reliefs.description: Details the reliefs used in the calculation.

residentialFinanceCosts.title: residentialFinanceCosts
residentialFinanceCosts.description: Details the residential finance cost reliefs used in the calculation.

amountClaimed.title: amountClaimed
amountClaimed.description: The amount being claimed including any carry forward amounts. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

allowableAmount.title: allowableAmount
allowableAmount.description: The lower of: finance costs not deducted, property business profits, adjusted total income (exceeding Personal Allowance). This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

rate.title: rate
rate.description: The tax rate used in the calculation. This value must be between 0 and 99.99 up to 2 decimal places.

propertyFinanceRelief.title: propertyFinanceRelief
propertyFinanceRelief.description: Property finance relief. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
